snippet: A new advertising campaign by Rosetta Stone highlights the advantages of learning a language rather than the merits of the company’s software-based method.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column on new campaign for language learning leader Rosetta Stone, which highlights the delight language learners can feel more than the mechanics of the method.

headline.main: An Emphasis on Fun for Language Learners
headline.print_headline: An Emphasis on Fun For Language Learners

snippet: Facebook signaled its ambitions to grow as a payment platform, with changes to how its users can buy goods and services without leaving its site. It is also a clear signal to Wall Street that the company is pushing to make more money.
abstract: Facebook signaled its ambitions to grow as a payment platform, with changes to how its users can buy goods and services without leaving its site. It is also a clear signal to Wall Street that the company is pushing to make more money.

headline.main: Facebook Shifts Its Approach to Payments
headline.print_headline: On Facebook, A Way to Use Real Money

snippet: Let's just assume for a few minutes that Microsoft's Surface tablet is as delicious as Microsoft executives made it out to be on Monday night. Does Microsoft then have any hope of competing with the iPad on price? Even if it does undercut Apple, w...
abstract: Let's just assume for a few minutes that Microsoft's Surface tablet is as delicious as Microsoft executives made it out to be on Monday night. Does Microsoft then have any hope of competing with the iPad on price? Even if it does undercut Apple, which no serious tablet maker has done, it is no assurance of success.

headline.main: The Cost of Microsoft's Surface Tablet

snippet: The London auction season kicked off on Tuesday night at Sotheby's, where a 1927 painting by Joan Miró, "Blue Star," brought nearly $37 million, a record price for the artist at auction.
abstract: The London auction season kicked off on Tuesday night at Sotheby's, where a 1927 painting by Joan Miró, "Blue Star," brought nearly $37 million, a record price for the artist at auction.

headline.main: Miró Painting Sets Record on Otherwise Lackluster Opening Night of London Auctions

snippet: For the first time, the company reported results for the Nook division separately. It recorded Nook sales of $933 million for the full fiscal year, an increase of 34 percent over the previous year.
abstract: For the first time, the company reported results for the Nook division separately. It recorded Nook sales of $933 million for the full fiscal year, an increase of 34 percent over the previous year.

headline.main: Despite Nook, Barnes & Noble Sales Miss Expectations
headline.print_headline: Despite Nook, Barnes & Noble Sales Miss Expectations

snippet: The iPad, for all its glory, suffers from one very distinct flaw: It's difficult to use for creation. Microsoft is going after this imperfection and has made it a staple of the new tablet, the Microsoft Surface.
abstract: The iPad, for all its glory, suffers from one very distinct flaw: It's difficult to use for creation. Microsoft is going after this imperfection and has made it a staple of the new tablet, the Microsoft Surface.

headline.main: Microsoft Surface Allows People to Create

snippet: The big news this morning is Microsoft's introduction of its Surface tablet, intended to challenge the iPad, reports Nick Wingfield in Tuesday's New York Times. The device has a built-in "kickstand" that allows it to be propped up for watching mov...
abstract: The big news this morning is Microsoft's introduction of its Surface tablet, intended to challenge the iPad, reports Nick Wingfield in Tuesday's New York Times. The device has a built-in "kickstand" that allows it to be propped up for watching movies, and a thin cover that also serves as a keyboard.

headline.main: Daily Report: Microsoft Introduces the Surface Tablet

snippet: Microsoft unveiled its new tablet, the Surface. There are many unanswered questions about it and some tough sledding ahead, but for the moment, we can celebrate the innovation.
abstract: Microsoft unveiled its new tablet, the Surface. There are many unanswered questions about it and some tough sledding ahead, but for the moment, we can celebrate the innovation.

headline.main: The Surface: Celebrate the Competition, Question the Premise

snippet: A green blob appeared on the screen of the MacBook. What was it? Could we get rid of it before it ate Cleveland?
abstract: A green blob appeared on the screen of the MacBook. What was it? Could we get rid of it before it ate Cleveland?

headline.main: The Case of the Screen's Green Blob

snippet: Americans fortunate enough to have a job are often overqualified and find that wages and benefits are down, leaving many unable to meet their expenses.

headline.main: Lost in Recession, Toll on Underemployed and Underpaid
headline.print_headline: Lost in Recession, Toll on Underemployed and Underpaid
